subject: Amazon Purchase
description_text:
I order a set of your pedals from Amazon (Invoice Attached) in the U.S. 
back on Dec 19th. They just showed up today and I have a question about 
whether or not the product I ordered should have included the base 
plate? From the listing and the pictures it certainly looks like it should.

Here is a picture of what I received.

Please let me know. If I received the correct product and your 
advertising shows the base plate in the picture and makes no mention of 
that fact they are for sure getting returned.

Thanks.

-Rich

-- 


      Rich Gunthert

Owner / Managing Member

Blaze It Firewood Products, LLC

	(615) 522-9238 <tel:16155551212>

	rich@blazeitfirewood.com <mailto:test@bif.com>

	www.blazeitfirewood.com <//www.bif.com>

	275 Old Natchez Trace Trail,  Camden, TN 38320

conversations.body_text: Hi Rich Gunthert,     Hi, I am sorry for it. We have reshipped a new package to you from our US warehouse, here is the tracking number: 1ZJ201H40300933100 , the shipping carrier is UPS, you can track it via https://www.ups.com/track.
